snippet: Torture, custodial killings and failure to protect vulnerable communities stained India's human rights record in 2011.
abstract: Torture, custodial killings and failure to protect vulnerable communities stained India's human rights record in 2011.
lead_paragraph: Torture, custodial killings, and failure to protect vulnerable communities stained India's human rights record in 2011, according to a recently published report by Human Rights Watch.

headline.main: Human Rights Watch Notes Abuses by Security Forces

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
